tool_description: Checks reviewer availability by analyzing current review loads, scheduled commitments, and stated availability preferences.

reviewer_ids.description: List of reviewer identifiers to check

error_messages: Invalid target date: Provide a valid future date in ISO 8601 format.
Review duration out of range: Duration must be between 7 and 90 days.
Invalid reviewer IDs: Some provided reviewer identifiers do not exist.
Too many reviewers: Limit to 50 reviewers for efficient availability checking.
usage: Provide reviewer_ids and target_date for review completion. Optionally specify review_duration to check availability for the required time period.

availability_status.description: Availability status for each reviewer: available, busy, unavailable, unknown

current_loads.description: Number of current review assignments for each reviewer

estimated_capacity.description: Estimated capacity for additional reviews: high, medium, low

availability_summary.description: Summary of overall availability and recommendations
